def_cn: （某些植物）带芒刺的小果实
def_en: A burr is the part of some plants which contains seeds and which has little hooks on the outside so that it sticks to clothes or fur.

def_cn: （英语方言中的）颤动小舌的r音，粗喉音
def_en: If someone has a burr, they speak English with a regional accent in which 'r' sounds are pronounced more strongly than in the standard British way of speaking.
